thread.title: RB3.5

author: RB3.5
title: RB3.5
text: I initially requested for about 5 samples to help me decide on the exact colour & fabric I wanted and they arrived around 4/5 days later. Once id made my decision I placed the order online which couldn't have been a simpler process. I was then sent emails throughout the process of ordering, making and delivering the blind which I found very helpful. The blind arrived around a week later and was of excellent quality & craftsmanship all in all I'm one very happy bunny!
